attributes.action: Make “always look on the bright side of live (clean)” the new national anthem
attributes.additional_details: Improve mental health across the country
attributes.background: Make it the new national anthem because it is much more positive and the current one has aged and we need something to cheer people up.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
